{{Infobox battle item |name = Clic+ |image = [[File:Bag_X_Click_Sprite.png]] |caption = Illustration du ''Clic+''. |price = 400 {{pdollar}} |location =
*[[XClick/fr#Shops|Boutiques]] *[[XClick/fr#Dungeons|Donjons]] }} == Description == Le'''Clic+''' est un type d'objet de combat. Il augmente temporairement l'Attaque de Clic du joueur de 50% pendant 30 secondes. == Détails == +50% d'Attaque de Clic == Acquisition == ===Boutiques=== {{ItemPrice/head‎|Battle items}} {{ItemPrice|[[Shops/fr#Kanto: Locations & Items|Jadielle]]|400 {{pdollar}}}} {{ItemPrice|[[Shops/fr#Kanto: Locations & Items|Safrania]]|400 {{pdollar}}}} {{ItemPrice|[[Shops/fr#Kanto: Locations & Items|Île 2 de Sevii]]|400 {{pdollar}}}} {{ItemPrice|[[Shops/fr#Kanto: Locations & Items|Île 5 de Sevii]]|400 {{pdollar}}}} {{ItemPrice|[[Shops/fr#Johto: Locations & Items|Ville Griotte]]|400 {{pdollar}}}} {{ItemPrice|[[Shops/fr#Johto: Locations & Items|Irisia]]|400 {{pdollar}}}} {{ItemPrice|[[Shops/fr#Hoenn: Locations & Items|Rosyères]]|400 {{pdollar}}}} {{ItemPrice|[[Shops/fr#Hoenn: Locations & Items|Lavandia]]|400 {{pdollar}}}} {{ItemPrice|[[Shops/fr#Hoenn: Locations & Items|Cimetronelle]]|400 {{pdollar}}}} {{ItemPrice|[[Shops/fr#Hoenn: Locations & Items|Éternara]]|400 {{pdollar}}}} {{ItemPrice|[[Shops/fr#Sinnoh: Locations & Items|Littorella]]|400 {{pdollar}}}} {{ItemPrice|[[Shops/fr#Sinnoh: Locations & Items|Unionpolis]]|400 {{pdollar}}}} {{ItemPrice|[[Shops/fr#Sinnoh: Locations & Items|Joliberges]]|400 {{pdollar}}}} {{ItemPrice|[[Shops/fr#Unova: Locations & Items|Floccesy Town]]|400 {{pdollar}}}} {{ItemPrice|[[Shops/fr#Unova: Locations & Items|Amaillide]]|400 {{pdollar}}}} {{ItemPrice|[[Shops/fr#Unova: Locations & Items|Janusia]]|400 {{pdollar}}}} {{ItemPrice|[[Shops/fr#Kalos: Locations & Items|Quarellis]]|400 {{pdollar}}}} {{ItemPrice|[[Shops/fr#Kalos: Locations & Items|Cromlac'h]]|400 {{pdollar}}}} {{ItemPrice|[[Shops/fr#Kalos: Locations & Items|La Frescale]]|400 {{pdollar}}}} {{ItemPrice|[[Shops/fr#Alola: Locations & Items|Lili'i]]|400 {{pdollar}}}} {{ItemPrice|[[Shops/fr#Alola: Locations & Items|Malié]]|400 {{pdollar}}}} {{ItemPrice|[[Shops/fr#Poké Mart|Centre Commercial]]|400 {{pdollar}}}} |} |}
